job.title: Software Engineer - Back-End, Java - Java
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: If you are a Software Engineer - Back-End, Java with experience, please read on!  What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Software Engineer - Back-End, Java with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Lauren.Formby@Optello.com Lauren Formby - Recruiting Manager - Optello  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
